# Package and Data Loading
```{r}
library(tidymodels)
library(tidyverse)
library(brms)
library(keras)

df <- read_csv("E:/School/R Work/UFC-Sports-Betting-Model/Data/fights.csv")

df <- df %>% 
  group_by(fight_pk) %>% 
  slice(1) %>% 
  ungroup()
```



# Data Partitioning
```{r}
set.seed(42)

tidy_split <- initial_split(df, prop = .8, strata = res)
train_data <- training(tidy_split)
test_data <- testing(tidy_split)

k_folds_data <- vfold_cv(train_data)
```
